code: import{useQuery}from"react-query";import Http from"./http.api";var GetCurrentYearUrl="http://hamnavazi-api.azurewebsites.net/api/Setting/GetCurrentYear";var getCurrentYear=function getCurrentYear(){return Http.get(GetCurrentYearUrl).then(function(res){return res.data.result;}).catch(function(err){return;});};export var useCurrentYear=function useCurrentYear(){return useQuery("currentYear",getCurrentYear,{refetchOnWindowFocus:false});};
